short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post your property listings on Craigslist Marketplace to increase exposure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily post your Highline Residential property listing to Craigslist.

Highline Residentialâ€™s Chrome extension enables agents to post their property listings from Highline Residential straight to Craigslist, without re-entering all of the details about the listing.

Follow these 4 easy steps to post your Highline Residential property listing on Facebook Marketplace:

- Log into your agent account on Highline Residential at hlres.com

- Add your property and create a property listing or open your existing property

- If you haven't already added the extension, you'll see an option to add the extension to your Chrome browser.

- Once the extension is added, click on the button with Craigslist icon.
